title: CMC to begin inoculation of those above 20 from tomorrow
body_lines: Colombo Municipal Council ( CMC) will begin the inoculation of those over 20 years of age from tomorrow, CMC Chief Medical officer Dr Ruwan Wijayamuni said today.
The vaccination centres are located at Sugathagadasa outdoor stadium, Jinthupitiya MOH office, Campbell Park, Forbes Road Community Hall, Shalika Hall and Roxy Garden. (Yohan Perera)
